Sabji '401': { name: 'Dal Tadka', rate: 110 }, '402': { name: 'Dal Fry', rate: 100 }, '403': { name: 'Amti (Maharashtrian Dal)', rate: 120 }, '404': { name: 'Bhendi Fry', rate: 140 }, '405': { name: rate: 250 }, '410': { name: 'Fish Curry (Koliwada)', rate: 220 }, // Drinks & Beverages '501': { name: 'Sol Kadhi', rate: 40 }, '502': { name: 'Buttermilk (Taak)', rate: 30 }, '503': { name: 'Sugarcane Juice', rate: 35 }, '504': { name: 'Tea', rate: 15 }, '505': { name: 'Coffee', rate: 20 }, '506': { name: 'Masala Tea', rate: 20 }, '507': { name: 'Cold Drink', rate: 25 }, '508': { name: 'Fresh Lime Water', rate: 30 }, // Sweets & Desserts '601': { name: 'Modak', rate: 50 }, '602': { name: 'Puran Poli', rate: 60 }, '603': { name: 'Shrikhand', rate: 80 }, '604': { name: 'Basundi', rate: 70 }, '605': { name: 'Gulab Jamun', rate: 60 }, '606': { name: 'Rasgulla', rate: 50 }, }; const FoodEntry = ({ onFoodSelect }) => { const [foodCode, setFoodCode] = useState(''); const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const handleFoodCodeChange = (e) => { setFoodCode(e.target.value); setError(''); }; const handleQuantityChange = (e) => { setQuantity(e.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (foodItems[foodCode]) { const selectedFood = { code: foodCode, name: foodItems[foodCode].name, rate: foodItems[foodCode].rate, quantity: parseInt(quantity) }; onFoodSelect(selectedFood); setFoodCode(''); setQuantity(1); } else { setError('Invalid food code'); } }; return (

Maharashtra Hotel Menu

Main Course - Rice Items (101-106)

  • 101 - Veg Biryani - ₹180
  • 102 - Chicken Biryani - ₹220
  • 103 - Mutton Biryani - ₹280
  • 104 - Plain Rice - ₹80
  • 105 - Jeera Rice - ₹120
  • 106 - Pulao - ₹150

Rotis & Breads (201-205)

  • 201 - Chapati - ₹15
  • 202 - Bhakri - ₹20
  • 203 - Naan - ₹35
  • 204 - Butter Naan - ₹45
  • 205 - Puran Poli - ₹60
